channel.title: Tommy Suzanne — Blog (EN)
channel.description: English blog posts by Tommy Suzanne.

item.title: Transmute Sexual Energy in Service of Your Goals
item.description: What if desire became your engine? Transmute sexual energy into creativity, focus, and action, guided by a lunar rhythm.

item.title: Discover Your Mission: Write Your Story and Name the Essential
item.description: A 30‑day compass: 7 questions + 3 exercises to write your story, surface your strengths, and name what matters.

item.title: Manifest Your Desires: From Intention to Reality
item.description: You don’t need more willpower: clarify the intention, align emotion with action, and move from desire to reality.

item.title: Quantum Acceleration: Tap Source Energy and Move Forward Every Day
item.description: When adversity hits, convert it. A simple protocol (breathwork, reframing, daily rituals) to tap source‑energy and move forward.
